agents.qoagent2

Class QOAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • agents.qoagent2.QOAgent

  • public class QOAgent
extends java.lang.Object
    The QOAgent class represents the automated agent.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Raz Lin
    See Also:
